ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 28
ygData.msgSnippet: You will find that skills other than Evocation, Abjuration, and Channeling will need help. This means you will need to help boost Divination (for later on when
ygData.messageBody:
You will find that skills other than Evocation, Abjuration, and Channeling
will need help.

This means you will need to help boost Divination (for later on when you get
invisibility) and Alteration. Alteration is GATE and FADE/Shadow Step. I
havet bothered with conjuration yet as Eye Of Zomm is fairly useless to me.

-Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: Stefan Raets [mailto:SRAETS@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 2:12 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 28


From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>

> Similarly, since fade and shadowstep both use the same
> skill as root,
> (abjuration?) at each level, I cast a ton of fades to
> increase that skill
> and make sure its at its maximum.

I don't know what I'm doing right or wrong here, but most of my mage
skills seem to be close to maxed. I've only had one fizzle at Bind
(out of 30 casts or so). I'm not going to bother with useless spells,
because everything seems to be going up nicely by itself. Of course,
this may change as I level up, so I'll keep your advice handy.

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
